The Pandora Disc
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Laboratory: Technical Research On The Monster Rancher CD Read Process: Subcode Data Files: Monster Rancher 3 Archive: Requested Non-Rare Monsters Archive: The Pandora Disc
By Lisa Shock on Tuesday, March 27, 2001 - 11:36 pm:

Here it is! The highly anticipated mystery disc from Tecmo, the Pandora!

By Farmer Jimbo on Friday, April 27, 2001 - 06:19 pm:

Will this CD produce the same "Pandora" effect on the USA version of MR2? I'm going to try it out now, but I figured I's ask the question anyway.

By Lisa Shock on Friday, April 27, 2001 - 06:53 pm:

No it simply makes a Ballon.

Please note that the disc makes a variety of monsters as you raise your rank as a breeder in the game. Once you are at Master rank, they rotate by seasons. See the MR3 CD list section about the Pandora Discs for detailed info about this.

By WHT Junior on Monday, October 1, 2001 - 06:35 pm:

Both Pandora Subcodes work. (Trying to get the message out) ^_^
